nigeria.name: Zobo (Hibiscus Drink)
nigeria.description: A refreshing beverage made from dred hibiscus petals, boiled with spices and sweeteners.

nigeria.name: EFO RIRO (Kale Soup)
nigeria.description: A rich stew from the Yoruba people, primarily consisting of spinach cooked with peppers, onions, and spices, often accompanied by meat or fish.

nigeria.name: Moi Moi Steamed Bean Pudding)
nigeria.description: A savory steamed pudding made from blended black-eyed peas.

nigeria.name: Akara (Fried Bean Cake)
nigeria.description: A refreshing beverage made from dred hibiscus petals, boiled with spices and sweeteners.

nigeria.name: OHA Stew (Hibiscus Drink)
nigeria.description: ​Oha Soup, also known as Ofe Oha or Ora Soup, is a traditional Igbo dish from southeastern Nigeria. ​

nigeria.name: OKRA SOUP AND STEW (Hibiscus Drink)
nigeria.description: A refreshing beverage made from dred hibiscus petals, boiled with spices and sweeteners.

nigeria.name: SUYA (Spiced cow kebas)
nigeria.description: A popular Hausa dish featuring grilled or roasted cow meat seasoned with a spicy pepper powder.

nigeria.name: Fried Palm Oil Stew
nigeria.description: A spicy stew made by frying a blend of tomatoes, peppers, and onions in palm oil. ​

nigeria.name: JOLLOF RICE AND CHICKEN WITH PLANTAIN
nigeria.description: A refreshing beverage made from dred hibiscus petals, boiled with spices and sweeteners.

algeria.name: Couscous
algeria.description: Algerian couscous is a traditional dish of steamed semolina topped with spiced meat, vegetables, and chickpeas.

algeria.name: LHAM HLOU
algeria.description: A sweet and fragrant Algerian dish made with tender meat, prunes, and cinnamon—traditionally served during Ramadan.

algeria.name: MHALBI
algeria.description: A silky Algerian rice pudding delicately flavored with orange blossom water, often enjoyed during Eid and family gatherings.

algeria.name: RECHTA
algeria.description: A traditional Algerian dish of handmade noodles served with chicken and a light white sauce, often prepared for celebrations.

algeria.name: BAKLAWA
algeria.description: A rich and flaky Algerian pastry made with layers of nuts and honey, often served during weddings and festive occasions.

algeria.name: HMISS
algeria.description: A spicy Algerian pepper and tomato salad, grilled and mixed with olive oil—served as a starter or side dish, especially in summer.

algeria.name: CHAKHCHOUKHA
algeria.description: A hearty Algerian dish made with flatbread soaked in a rich meat and vegetable sauce, especially loved in eastern regions like Biskra.

algeria.name: BAGHRIR
algeria.description: Soft and spongy Algerian pancakes full of tiny holes, soaked in butter and hone, often enjoyed for breakfast or with afternoon tea.

algeria.name: CHAKCHOUKA
algeria.description: A flavorful Algerian dish made with sautéed tomatoes, peppers, and eggs, perfect for a comforting meal any time of day.

somalia.name: Sambusas
somalia.description: Crispy triangular pastries filled with spiced meat or vegetables, popular during Ramadan.

somalia.name: Bariis iyo hilib
somalia.description: Spiced Somali rice served with meat, often lamb or goat, cooked with raisins and vegetables.

somalia.name: Rooti Farmaajo
somalia.description: Somali cheesy bread or waffles, often eaten as a snack or breakfast with tea.

somalia.name: Sabaayad
somalia.description: Somali flatbread similar to paratha, soft and flaky, usually served with honey or stew.

somalia.name: Fuul
somalia.description: Mashed fava beans cooked with spices, often topped with olive oil and served with bread..

somalia.name: Bariis iyo Digag
somalia.description: Somali rice served with chicken, seasoned with spices like cardamom, cumin, and cloves.

somalia.name: Shaah Somali
somalia.description: Sweet spiced Somali tea made with black tea, cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves

somalia.name: Burr
somalia.description: Deep-fried sweet dough balls, soaked in sugar syrup—similar to gulab jamun.

somalia.name: Suqaar
somalia.description: Stir-fried diced meat (usually beef or goat) with vegetables, served with flatbread or rice.

cuba.name: Arooz Con Pollo
cuba.description: A traditional Latin American and Spanish dish meaning rice with chicken.

cuba.name: CHEESY BEEF EMPANADAS
cuba.description: This filling, inspired by a secret recipe, is tasty as is but can be elevated with red wine

cuba.name: ARROZ CON GANDULES
cuba.description: A Cuban staple of rice, pork, pigeon peas, tomato paste, achiote, and sofrito, often enjoyed with pernil, yuca fries, and coquito.​

cuba.name: CLASSIC MOJITO
cuba.description: A Cuban cocktail made with sugar cane, lime, mint, rum, and soda water, offering refreshing beach vibes

cuba.name: BLACK BEAN SOUP
cuba.description: A rich, creamy soup with deep purple-black color, spiced with onions, jalapeños, cumin, and chili powder.

cuba.name: CUBAN SANDWICH
cuba.description: A Cuban  sandwich with slow-roasted citrus-marinated pork, ham, Swiss, pickles, and mustard, all pressed to perfection.

cuba.name: ROPA VIEJA
cuba.description: Cuba's national dish, this beef stew features shredded flank steak in a flavorful tomato-onion-pepper sauce.

cuba.name: MOJO SHRIMP
cuba.description: A citrus-garlic marinade common in Cuban cuisine, this tangy blend of orange and lime juice enhances the flavor.

cuba.name: BAGHSTRAWBERRY DAIQUIRIRIR
cuba.description: A smooth, frosty cocktail made from a blend of fresh and frozen strawberries, perfect for refreshing daiquiri lovers.

peru.name: CEVICHE
peru.description: Raw fish (often sea bass or flounder) marinated in lime juice with onions, chili peppers, and cilantro.

peru.name: LOMO SALTADO
peru.description: Stir-fried beef with onions, tomatoes, soy sauce, and french fries, served with rice.

peru.name: PERUVIAN ARROZ CON POLLO
peru.description: Green rice with chicken, cilantro, and vegetables.

peru.name: PISCO SOUR
peru.description: The national drink of Peru, made with pisco (a type of brandy), lime juice, egg white, sugar, and bitters.

peru.name: SOLTERITO
peru.description: A fresh, colorful salad made with lima beans, corn, onions, tomatoes, and fresh herbs, often served as a side dish.

peru.name: PICARONES
peru.description: Peruvian doughnuts made from sweet potato and squash, fried and served with a syrup made from molasses.

peru.name: FISH ESCABECHE
peru.description: Fish Escabeche features fish marinated in vinegar, garlic, onions, and spices, offering a tangy, savory flavor..

peru.name: CHUPE DE CAMARONES
peru.description: Shrimp chowder with potatoes, corn, and cheese.

peru.name: CHICHA MORADA
peru.description: Sweet drink made from purple corn and spices.

japan.name: TOSHIKOSHI SOBA
japan.description: Toshikoshi Soba is a simple buckwheat noodle soup with light broth and toppings like green onions or tempura.

japan.name: Maguro Nigiri (まぐろ握り)
japan.description: Hand-formed sushi with vinegared rice and raw tuna slices.

japan.name: Sushi Moriawase (寿司盛り合わせ)
japan.description: Assorted sushi (nigiri, maki, sashimi), served with soy, ginger, wasabi.

japan.name: Tonkatsu (豚カツ)
japan.description: Deep-fried breaded pork cutlet with sauce and cabbage.

japan.name: Tataki (たたき)
japan.description: Lightly seared meat or fish, sliced thin and served with ponzu.

japan.name: Chirashi Don (ちらし丼)
japan.description: Sushi rice bowl topped with assorted raw fish and veggies.

japan.name: Aburi Sake Nigiri (炙りサーモン握り)
japan.description: Flame-seared salmon on sushi rice, often with mayo or herbs.

japan.name: Okonomiyaki (お好み焼き)
japan.description: A savory cabbage pancake with toppings like pork, seafood, mayo, and okonomiyaki sauce.

japan.name: Kaiseki Ryōri (懐石料理)
japan.description: Refined multi-course seasonal meal with artistic presentation.

sweden.name: Gluten Free Mudcake
sweden.description: Gluten-free sticky chocolate cake, where the choice of flour adds its own unique flavor

sweden.name: MASHED POTATOES & MEATBALLS
sweden.description: Homemade meatballs are always a hit. Serve them with creamy sauce, mashed potatoes.

sweden.name: WAFFLES WITH WIPPED CREAM
sweden.description: Making your own waffle batter is super easy! This basic recipe creates the crispiest waffles,

sweden.name: SPINACH SOUP
sweden.description: Classic spinach soup, traditionally served with a boiled egg.

sweden.name: OVEN-BAKED CHICKEN THIGHS
sweden.description: Juicy chicken thighs baked with a creamy sun-dried tomato sauce.

sweden.name: ROASTED PORK
sweden.description: Roast pork tenderloin for juicy, flavorful meat. Serve with creamy sauce, thyme, mushrooms, garlic.

sweden.name: BLUEBERRY SMOOTHIE
sweden.description: A filling and tasty milk drink with a lovely color. Blend banana, milk, mild quark.

sweden.name: SMÖRGÅSTÅRTA
sweden.description: A sandwich cake with salmon, shrimp, and boiled eggs – truly delicious! Perfect for holidays and summer celebrations.

sweden.name: OVEN-BAKED SALMON
sweden.description: Oven-baked salmon is perfect for serving a crowd. Serve with boiled potatoes, sour cream sauce with roe and herbs, and a salad.
